1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Operators on content order.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Order
6  ( copsOrder
7    -- $Operators
8  ) where
9
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture           as O
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data               as D
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Coxhand        as H
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message   as Msg
14
15
16-- ----------------------
17-- $Operators
18--
19--  [@=@]     Equal.
20--
21--  [@\<\>@]  Not equal.
22--
23--  [@<@]     Less than.
24--
25--  [@<=@]    Less than or equal.
26--
27--  [@>@]     Grater than.
28--
29--  [@>=@]    Grater than or equal.
30--
31
32-- | Oerators on content order.
33copsOrder :: (D.CBool c, Eq c, Ord c) => [D.Cop c]
34copsOrder =
35    [ orderInfix     "="   (==)
36    , orderInfix     "<>"  (/=)
37    , orderInfix     "<"   (<)
38    , orderInfix     "<="  (<=)
39    , orderInfix     ">"   (>)
40    , orderInfix     ">="  (>=)
41
42    , orderPrefix    "="
43    , orderPrefix    "<>"
44    , orderPrefix    "<"
45    , orderPrefix    "<="
46    , orderPrefix    ">"
47    , orderPrefix    ">="
48
49    , orderPostfix   "="
50    , orderPostfix   "<>"
51    , orderPostfix   "<"
52    , orderPostfix   "<="
53    , orderPostfix   ">"
54    , orderPostfix   ">="
55
56    , D.CopCox  (D.copNormal "between") between
57    ]
58
59orderInfix :: (D.CBool c) => String -> (c -> c -> Bool) -> D.Cop c
60orderInfix n f = D.CopCalc (D.copInfix n) g where
61    g args = do (x, y) <- D.getRightArg2 args
62                D.putBool $ x `f` y
63
64orderPrefix :: String -> D.Cop c
65orderPrefix n = D.CopCox (D.copPrefix n) $ cop where
66    cop [x] = Right $ H.f1 (H.b1 `op` x)
67    cop _   = Msg.adlib "require operand"
68    op      = H.bin n
69
70orderPostfix :: String -> D.Cop c
71orderPostfix n = D.CopCox (D.copPostfix n) $ cop where
72    cop [x] = Right $ H.f1 (x `op` H.b1)
73    cop _   = Msg.adlib "require operand"
74    op      = H.bin n
75
76between :: D.CopCox c
77between [low, high] = Right $ H.f1 $ (low `binAsc` H.b1) `binAnd` (H.b1 `binAsc` high)
78between _ = Msg.adlib "require operand"
79
80binAnd :: O.Bin (D.Cox c)
81binAnd  = H.bin "and"
82
83binAsc :: O.Bin (D.Cox c)
84binAsc  = H.bin "<="
85
